name: develup
description: Setup commands for web development tools by kazaoki.

scripts.dev: npx parcel watch src/develup.js --out-dir dist --out-file develup --target node --no-source-maps
scripts.build: npx parcel build src/develup.js --out-dir dist --out-file develup --target node --no-source-maps --no-cache && node src/build-after.js
